name: Python CI on Multiple OS

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest, macos-latest]

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.13'
          cache: 'pip'  # кэширование pip-зависимостей

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Run tests
        run: pytest
